TopicTitle: The KOI-4 Linebacker SSTO family (Tested with MechJeb, NEAR) (BDArmory required)

Articles.Content:
> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/1cJBC)

Downloads [here](https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0BwjcH5bX0ssYfjhIZTFvUWV4T0xsemFxNjNndUU3Q3hyanh6TVo1ZjFTWUZDRndhWGpkWHM&usp=sharing&tid=0BwjcH5bX0ssYfjlFd2pOTExiaW41MlNEcEZMTFdpNW85WmZtX3AxSnRwNlJsazJUei1MdE0). Action Group info and flight instructions are included in the craft descriptions.

You look like you are interested in weaponized craft. Would you like to join [Kerbal Military Engineering](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114591-Kerbal-Military-Engineering-BD-Armory)? They make warships using BDArmory. I'm sure Kerdinand would love to have you-we don't have many SSTOs.
